title: Awesome 2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment in Atlanta
posting_body: ['Awesome 2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment in Atlanta.', 'with private garage short drive to Street.', 'Spacious Living Room with a large windows allowing for natural lighting.', 'Neutral colors throughout, with new wood floors water heater, roof and HVAC.', 'Downstairs unit in quiet quadruplex.', 'Tile and vinyl "wood" floors.', 'Good closet space.', 'Washer & Dryer included.', 'The fireplace is for looks only ... non-functioning.', 'Will consider a cat (no dogs).', 'Non-smokers only.', 'To view this apartment or for any questions..!!', 'Tenant pays water.', 'A small pet may be considered with deposit.', 'No dogs over 20lbs or aggressive breeds.', 'No smoking.', 'Two months security.', 'Two year lease preferred.', 'Those with prior evictions will not be considered.', 'Call to make an appointment.', 'Available September.', 'One Year Lease Worcester, No Dogs, No brokers.', 'Please showing up my email and text me at nancy236904^at^g^m^a^i^l^d^o^t^c^o^m']
